name: The Last Mercenary
description:
The Last Mercenary is a third person tower defense game where you must protectThe Kingdom of Calces from hordes of enemy forces.

As part of a project for our respective courses, this game was created by seven students from the games and animation departments at SAE Institute Dubai along with nine collaborators. We are delighted to release our game to the public and would love to receive any feedback you have which can help us improve the project in the following form: https://forms.gle/yF31Hp7XRQsCm6u97

Credits:

Music Composed by Jason Baretto and Denver Perera
